Gotta problem. Yes this download installs and works great BUT it doesn't seem to have a preferences file. I jacked up the VST scan and now it's searching my entire drive for VSTs on loadup and crashing. A simple fix for this is go in and erase preferences.cfg but there is no such file with this crack. Uninstalling and deleting everything Ableton and reinstalling is no help. I have to find a way to delete the preferences or reformat my drive. Anybody know what to do? Thanks.
